Job Posting:165656 - Position: S25 Frontend Developer Intern 165656B E1 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 03/04/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 02/20/2025 02:51 PM Expired ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Coveo 3175 des Quatre-Bourgeois, Suite 200 Quebec City G1W 2K7 QC Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2025 - Summer S25 Frontend Developer Intern 165656B E1 Co-op Position Various Locations Canada 4 months Hybrid CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Locations (apply thorugh the different links below) • Montreal, QC - closed • Quebec City, QC Are you ready to bring your coding skills to life by building sleek and user-friendly interfaces? We're looking for people energized by frontend development to contribute to one of the following teams: • The Developer Experience & User Interface (DXUI) team develops and maintains software libraries that facilitate the implementation and maintenance of the front-end part of customer implementations. They also work on tools and libraries related broadly to Implementers. • The Frontend Foundation team develops and supports the common components and general panels of the Administration Console as well as enable developers to contribute easily to the Admin UI by offering tools and consulting services. • The Service Core team supports the Coveo for Service line of business and the different Service Integrations by building dedicated backend services. • The Sources team aims to provide a seamless and unified user experience across all Coveo resources, simplifying the way customers manage and monitor their organizations What your typical day would look like: You start your day off with a team meeting (scrum) to track the progress on the team's different projects and elevate each other • by sharing innovative ideas. • Take ownership of your current projects, start your day with some coding! • You then jump on a Zoom call to shadow the work your coach is doing, asking questions and learning from their approach. • As you're eager to be given more responsibilities, you make sure to test your code like a pro for it to deliver tangible value. Get ready to cross collaborate between different teams internally, this role will have you working with multiple developers. • After lunch your priorities shift, and along with your coach you begin on a project to contribute to improving our monitoring, security and infrastructure! • The day is coming to an end! You take some time to review the feedback you received from your latest code review and understand how you can improve for next time. Here's what will qualify you for the role: You are currently enrolled in a Software Engineering or Computer Science program. • • You have completed an internship in a similar role. • • You have experience in: To join our DXUI team: Typescript, Javascript. • To join our Frontend Foundation team: React, Javascript, Typescript. • To join our Service Core team: React, Typescript, Java, Scala. • To join our Sources team: Typescript, React. • You have a strong sense of ownership and are proud of what you create. • You're curious by nature, you're not afraid to ask the right questions to get a thorough understanding of your tasks. And the cherry on top that will make you stand out: You've participated in some hackathons and/or have a few personal projects. • You've got a head full of ideas; you're passionate about the technology industry. • You don't need to check every single box; passion goes a long way and we appreciate that skills are transferable. Send us your application, we want to hear from you! Join the Coveolife! We encourage all candidates to apply regardless of, for example, age, gender, disability, gaps in CV, national or ethnic background. #LI-hybrid Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
